articles.author: Jason Dasey, Jemima Burt
articles.title: Flight Centre in court for alleged underpayment of staff through 'dubious' pay system - ABC News
articles.description: Five former Flight Centre employees tell the first day of a trial in the Federal Circuit Court in Brisbane they were pressured to attending after-work functions and expected to do unpaid overtime.

articles.title: ASX up 0.7%; Afterpay leads IT gains; banks surge - The Age
articles.description: The ASX 200 added 0.3% on Monday thanks to gains for the big banks, Afterpay and Wesfarmers. The mining titans and CSL slipped.
articles.content:
The Aussie dollar was trading above US75 cents.
